name: Add a new row in Microsoft Excel for every JotForm submission
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically adding new JotForm submissions to Microsoft Excel. With this template, every time a user submits a form on JotForm, Make will create a new row in your Excel worksheet, ensuring that all your responses are organized and easily accessible for analysis. This integration eliminates manual data entry, saving you time and reducing the risk of errors. Perfect for managing surveys, registrations, or feedback forms.
